attributes.action: Home office to grant Discretionary leave to remain to Commonwealth citizens
attributes.additional_details: After India, the next-largest Commonwealth countries by population are Pakistan, Nigeria , Bangladesh, the United Kingdom (65 million), South Africa , Canada ,Ghana  and Australia
attributes.background: There are thousands of people from common wealth countries living in the Uk all these years, without their rights to work. We are hard working people and will heal to grow the Uk Economy

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure whether you want all Commonwealth Citizens to be given the right to live and work in the UK or only those Commonwealth Citizens who have been living in the UK for a certain period of time. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. If you're specifically concerned about the Windrush generation, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/216539
